description: go/build: clarify why we exclude files starting with '_' or '.'

messages.text:
LGTM

please shorten the comment a bit per suggestion

http://codereview.appspot.com/5864053/diff/2001/src/pkg/go/build/build.go
File src/pkg/go/build/build.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5864053/diff/2001/src/pkg/go/build/build.go#newcode340
src/pkg/go/build/build.go:340: //	- files starting with _ or . (which are likely to be editor temporary files)
just:

(likely editor temporary files)

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

It took me quite some time digging into the hg history to find out this is documented
in comment in cmd/dist/build.c

I think ignoring filenames starting with '.' is natural, but for ‘_', it's not that natural,
so I add this clarification (and also note that we do have lib9/_p9dir.c and lib9/_exits.c).

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=49243ebbbda6 ***

go/build: clarify why we exclude files starting with '_' or '.'

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5864053

subject: code review 5864053: go/build: clarify why we exclude files starting with '_...
